targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, state) (zfs_pool_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool"})
max by(instance, zpool) (zfs_pool_vdevs{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"})
max by(instance, zpool) (zfs_pool_load_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"}) * 1000
max by(instance, zpool) (zfs_pool_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"})
max by(zpool, state) (node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"} == 1)
time() - max by(instance, zpool) (zfs_pool_load_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"})

options.content:
`allocated` property is only tracked for devices directly under root.
This is usually vdevs (mirror, raidz, etc), but if you don't have redundancy,
it is tracked at the disk level.

Read from vdev is usually much smaller than read from dataset,
because the majority of data is cached in ARC.

L2ARC vdev is not tracked by the exporter,
and ZFS doesn't expose separate per-pool statistics for L2ARC.

Read/write latency can be missing in case there were no corresponding operations.

targets.expr:
max by(instance, zpool, state) (
max without(state) (max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="online"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 2
or
max without(state) (max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="offline"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 3
or
max without(state) (max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="removed"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 4
or
max without(state) (max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="suspended"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 5
or
max without(state) (max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="degraded"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 6
or
max without(state) (max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="faulted"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 7
or
max without(state) (max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="unavail"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 8
)
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_space_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_space_allocated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_ashift_configured{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_children{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_fragmentation{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_rebuild_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_scan_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_self_healed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_slow_ios{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (zfs_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"})
min by(instance, zpool, vdev) (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__interval]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_devsize_replaceable{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_physical_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_space_allocated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_ashift_configured{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_fragmentation{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (zfs_vdev_trim_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"} and (zfs_vdev_trim_unsupported == 0))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (1 - zfs_vdev_trim_unsupported{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"})
min by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(min_over_time(zfs_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path, type) (label_replace(zfs_vdev_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}, "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_ops{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_ops{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.description: includes queue and disk read itself

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_zio_latency_total_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.title: read latency p99 (zio)

panels.description: includes queue and disk read itself

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_zio_latency_total_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.title: write latency p99 (zio)

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_latency_disk_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_latency_disk_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(
  min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval])
  and
  (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_unsupported{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) == 0),
  "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)")
)
$__to / 1000 - max by(zpool, vdev, path) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_action_time{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"}[$__interval]) != 0)

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_scan_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))
max by(zpool, vdev, path) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_estimated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"}[$__interval]) != 0)

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(
  rate(zfs_vdev_trim_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__rate_interval])
  and
  (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_unsupported{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) == 0),
  "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)")
)
